content: The Great Sage's Broken Shell is one of the main and final bosses you'll fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). You'll jump into this fight as soon as you finish against The Stone Monkey, and it's the final one needed to see the ending of the game.

The content is as follows:
The Great Sage's Broken Shell is one of the main and final bosses you'll fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). You'll jump into this fight as soon as you finish against The Stone Monkey, and it's the final one needed to see the ending of the game.
